snippet: A spokesman for President Ram Baran Yadav of Nepal said the political parties were committed to having a conclusion next week on how elections should be conducted.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for President Ram Baran Yadav of Nepal said the political parties were committed to having a conclusion next week on how elections should be conducted.

headline.seo: Nepal’s Political Leaders Are Given More Time to Agree on Government
headline.main: Nepal’s Political Leaders Given More Time to Agree on Government
headline.print_headline: Nepal’s Political Leaders Are Given More Time to Agree on Government
